statements: SELECT * FROM gait_analysis_data WHERE participant_id = 123;
SELECT participant_id, gait_speed FROM gait_analysis_data WHERE cadence > 100;
SELECT stride_length, step_width FROM gait_analysis_data ORDER BY stride_length DESC;
SELECT cadence, stride_width FROM gait_analysis_data WHERE gait_speed < 1.0;
SELECT participant_id, cadence, stride_length FROM gait_analysis_data WHERE step_width > 0.2 ORDER BY participant_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM gait_analysis_data WHERE gait_speed > 1.5 ORDER BY participant_id ASC, stride_length DESC;
SELECT participant_id, cadence, step_width FROM gait_analysis_data WHERE cadence < 100 AND step_width BETWEEN 15.0 AND 20.0;
SELECT participant_id, gait_speed, stride_length FROM gait_analysis_data WHERE gait_speed > 2.0 ORDER BY stride_length DESC, gait_speed ASC;
SELECT AVG(gait_speed), MIN(stride_width), MAX(cadence) FROM gait_analysis_data WHERE participant_id IN (1, 2, 4);
SELECT participant_id, stride_length, step_width FROM gait_analysis_data WHERE cadence > 110 OR step_width < 18.5 ORDER BY participant_id DESC, step_width ASC;
SELECT * FROM gait_analysis_data WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT stride_length, cadence FROM gait_analysis_data WHERE cadence > 100;
SELECT gait_speed FROM gait_analysis_data ORDER BY gait_speed DESC;
SELECT participant_id, stride_length, cadence FROM gait_analysis_data WHERE stride_length <= 1.5;
SELECT * FROM abnormalities_data WHERE abnormality_type LIKE '%foot%' AND severity_level > 2;
SELECT * FROM gait_analysis_data ORDER BY participant_id DESC;
SELECT participant_id, stride_length, cadence FROM gait_analysis_data WHERE participant_id = 3;

SELECT abnormalities_data.participant_id, gait_analysis_data.stride_length, gait_analysis_data.gait_speed FROM abnormalities_data JOIN gait_analysis_data ON abnormalities_data.participant_id = gait_analysis_data.participant_id;
SELECT participant_id, AVG(stride_length) AS avg_stride_length FROM gait_analysis_data GROUP BY participant_id HAVING AVG(stride_length) > 1.2;
SELECT participant_id, abnormality_type, severity_level FROM abnormalities_data WHERE severity_level BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY participant_id, severity_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM gait_data WHERE stride_length > 1.2 AND cadence < 100;
SELECT patient_id, date_of_analysis FROM gait_data ORDER BY date_of_analysis DESC;

SELECT abnormalities.type_of_abnormality, gait_data.stance_duration, patients.first_name FROM abnormalities JOIN gait_data ON abnormalities.gait_id = gait_data.gait_id JOIN patients ON gait_data.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE patients.age > 50;
SELECT * FROM patients JOIN gait_data ON patients.patient_id = gait_data.patient_id;
SELECT first_name, age, stride_length FROM patients p JOIN gait_data g ON p.patient_id = g.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT last_name, cadence, stance_duration FROM gait_data WHERE date_of_analysis = '2022-01-15';
SELECT first_name, last_name, type_of_abnormality FROM patients p JOIN gait_data g ON p.patient_id = g.patient_id JOIN abnormalities a ON g.gait_id = a.gait_id;
SELECT * FROM gait_analysis_data ORDER BY stride_length DESC;
SELECT patient_id, step_duration FROM gait_analysis_data WHERE cadence > 100;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM walking_patterns WHERE pattern_id = 2;
SELECT abnormality_name, description FROM abnormalities ORDER BY abnormality_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM gait_data_mapping WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM gait_analysis_data ORDER BY stride_length DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, gait_speed FROM gait_analysis_data WHERE cadence > 100;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM walking_patterns WHERE pattern_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT patient_id, gait_speed FROM gait_analysis_data JOIN gait_data_mapping ON gait_analysis_data.patient_id = gait_data_mapping.patient_id WHERE gait_speed > 1.5;
SELECT abnormality_name, description FROM abnormalities WHERE abnormality_name LIKE '%pronation%' ORDER BY abnormality_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT user_id, username, age, gender FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT measurement_id, measurement_date, step_count FROM measurements WHERE user_id=1;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE location='Living Room';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, gender FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS measurement_count FROM measurements GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_name LIKE 'H%';
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description, pattern_score FROM walking_patterns ORDER BY pattern_score DESC;
